category.name: Product Structure.CAD BOM Alignment
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: FND0_ENABLE_CBA_EXPOSURE
preference.preference_description: Enables the exposure of Part-CAD alignment user interface in Acitve Workspace. If true, Active Workspace UI will show aligned design for parts and will allow user to align designs to part. If false, the aligned designs section will not be presented in the user interface.
